column4: heres a weird thing, ubuntu 12.10. randomly my sound will fade from LSpeaker, to Rspeaker, then equal out. any ideas?
ive already tested VIA LiveCD..
and i played 3Hrs of mp3s...this didnt happen till i went 12.04->12.10
is there a newer kernel i can test? how far back can 12.10 go?
i like 12.10..but how would i downgrade?
eep! ill stay with 12.10 and wait for a LTS
8 minutes? using what method?
ill just stay with 12.10. where would i check alsa/kernel ?
i cannt wait for 13.04
so next LTS is 2yrs away? but the next rls is 13.04 ?
18 months away; yes
you should say how you are trynig
so what key are you pressing?
the volume up key
are you sure that's recognized as XF86AuidoRaiseVolume?
but it looked funny?
yeah, kill xbindkeys.  Though that probably means it's working :)
try /usr/bin/amixer instead of just amixer
also, get rid of the semicolon
no problem
now use espeak to have some keys say random things
haha my officemate loves them I'm sure
